content.question: <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of open parenthesis, the inverse cosine of x, close parenthesis, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the square root of 1 minus, x squared, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the square root of 1 minus, x squared, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the inverse sine of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the cosine to the negative 2 power of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the square root of 1 minus, x squared, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
